name: Sustainable urban form - compact city or garden suburb?
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description:
Maurice Strong Rio + 20: The future health of our planet will be determined in our cities.
Achieving urban sustainability appears to be an imperative with a short timescale for delivery. Given that sustainability needs to be a balance of social, environmental and economic factors, what are the current drivers for creating sustainable urban environments in our existing cities and what should be the drivers for creating sustainable urban environments? This seminar will explore the issues through a comparison of city forms.

presentations.name: Developing city visions
presentations.speakers: Professor Tim Dixon, Chair, Sustainable Futures in the Built Environment, University of Reading

presentations.name: Urban metabolism
presentations.speakers: Dr Adriana Allen, Senior Lecturer, Development Planning Unit, UCL

presentations.name: Compact cities: understanding the role of density
presentations.speakers: Dr Chris Boyko, Senior Research Associate, University of Lancaster

presentations.name: Urban neighbourhood network
presentations.speakers: Dr Nicholas Falk, Founder & Director, URBED
